I live in a two-story house, on a cute little street.
There are 13 rooms in my house, and in my favorite room,...
...which is my mom's art studio, there's a big sofa next to the piano.
In the backyard, there's a deck and a pool.
I live in a big house with many rooms.
There are three bedrooms, a living room, a dining room,...
There's also a pool and a garage.
My favorite room is my bedroom.
It is right across from my parents' room.
In my bedroom, there are two closets, a desk,...
...and the chair is across from my bed.
My painting is right above my bed.
